body.head: Home
body.p: The Nineteenth-Century Serials Edition (ncse) is a free, online edition of six nineteenth-century periodicals and newspapers:

ncse includes full runs of the first five titles, and a decade only of the Publishers’ Circular. Titles are represented as completely as possible, including multiple editions, advertisements, wrappers, and supplements where we could find them.

The edition features full-page facsimiles and textual transcripts generated through OCR. All six journals are segmented to article level, and can be downloaded freely. There is rich, fully-searchable metadata attached to titles, volumes, issues, departments and articles within the edition.
To browse or search the edition by image, subject, name or place, use the links above; to begin browsing and searching the journals themselves follow the link below.
